publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3008 Scott Barrie: Dunfermline Press and West Fife Advertiser—That the Parliament congratulates the Dunfermline Press and West Fife Advertiser on winning the Scottish Local Newspaper of the Year Award 2002; believes that the newspaper has played a valuable role in Dunfermline and west Fife over the past year; looks forward to another year of excellent service, and hopes that it will continue to be Fife’s best selling weekly for many more years to come.

S1M-3008 Scott Barrie: Dunfermline Press and West Fife Advertiser-That the Parliament congratulates the Dunfermline Press and West Fife Advertiser on winning the Scottish Local Newspaper of the Year Award 2002; believes that the newspaper has played a valuable role in Dunfermline and west Fife over the past year; looks forward to another year of excellent service, and hopes that it will continue to be Fife's best selling weekly for many more years to come.
S1M-3008 Dunfermline Press and West Fife Advertiser (lodged on 18 April 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*, Margaret Jamieson*
S1M-3008 Dunfermline Press and West Fife Advertiser (lodged on 18 April 2002) Janis Hughes*
